item.title: Ai Generated Content Emmerge
item.description:
is the internet still could be trusted ?

Its bothering me in this last couple of month i am seeing or feel seeing and reading AI generated content. it could be text, images or video. and i wonder if articles or video was took a day to research and write or create, now, could take a couple of minutes? second?

Content Creation Before AI

Before the adoption of AI, content creation relied heavily on human. The years between 2000 and 2020 (maybe) saw a steady rise in content production, driven by the internet Boom and Social Media Growth, platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram introduced new opportunities for user-generated content. and TikTok of course.
